tabs.redirect_to_stripe: You are going to get redirected to our partner to manage your subscriptions.

action.reset.warn: You are about to reset your server. This action will delete all files and will not be recoverable.
action.proceed_question: Are you sure you want to proceed?

ftp.instruction: Download an FTP client of your choice and use the information below to connect.
ftp.password_alert: Your password is hidden for added security. If you lose your password, you will have to reset it.

reset_password.title: Password reset
reset_password.warn: You are about to reset the password to access the FTP server.
reset_password.instruction: Please enter your account password to generate a new password for the FTP server.

new_password.title: Password
new_password.warn: Remember to write down or save the password.

console.server_is_starting: Your server is warming up, please wait.
console.server_must_be_started: Your server must be started in order to use the console.

internal_error.title: Internal error
internal_error.description: We were unable to contact our server. Check your internet connection or try refreshing the page.

no_parameters.title: No parameters
no_parameters.description: There are no parameters for this server

no_server.title: It's empty
no_server.description: It looks like you don't have a server yet. Start by renting a server or select one on the left of the screen if you already have one.

not_found.description: We were unable to find your server. Please try to recreate it.

pending.description: Your server is being prepared. Refresh the list to see its new status.

suspended.description: Your server is suspended. This may be due to a payment problem or because you have cancelled the subscription. See the Subscription tab for more information.

profile.title: This page is under construction.
profile.description: For any request related to the management of your data (deletion, modification, recovery, ...), please contact us by email at
